member.summary: Exports rendered report to an Excel file.

member.name: M:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiExcelExportService.ExportExcel(NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.StiReport,System.IO.Stream,NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.StiPagesRange,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Exports rendered report to an Excel file.
member.param: A report which is to be exported.
A stream for export of a document.
Describes range of pages of the document for the export.
If true then the first page header and the last page footer will be exported for all exported documents.
If true then only data from the DataBand of the page will be exported.
If true then the Object formatting will be applied for the exported file. If the ExportDataOnly is false then this parameter is ignored.

member.name: T:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges
member.summary: Enumeration describes possible user access privileges to the pdf document. User access privileges are managed by the user password. Owner with the correct owner password has all possible privileges for the content of the pdf document and a rule for setting document permissions.

member.name: F:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.None
member.summary: User password allows only opening the pdf document, decrypt it, and display it on the screen.

member.name: F:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.PrintDocument
member.summary: User password allows opening the pdf document, decrypt it, display it on the screen and print its content.

member.name: F:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.ModifyContents
member.summary: User password allows modifying the content of the pdf document.

member.name: F:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.CopyTextAndGraphics
member.summary: User password allows copying text and graphics objects from the content of the pdf document.

member.name: F:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.AddOrModifyTextAnnotations
member.summary: User password allows adding or modifying text annotations in the content of the pdf document.

member.name: F:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.All
member.summary: User password allows all modifications on the content of the pdf document.

member.name: T:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiPdfEncryptionKeyLength
member.summary: Enumeration which sets an encryption key length of the resulting pdf file.

member.name: F:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiPdfEncryptionKeyLength.Bit40
member.summary: 40 bit encryption key length.

member.name: F:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiPdfEncryptionKeyLength.Bit128
member.summary: 128 bit encryption key length.

A stream for export of a document.

If embeddedFont is true then, when exporting, fonts of the report will be included in the resulting document.
If standardPdfFont is true then, when exporting, non-standard fonts of the report will be replaced by the standard fonts in resulting document.
A parameter which controls a compression of the exported pdf document.

member.name: M:NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiPdfExportService.ExportPdf(NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.StiReport,System.IO.Stream,NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.StiPagesRange,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,NsgSoft.ReportBuilder.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges)

If embeddedFont is true then, when exporting, fonts of the report will be included in the resulting document.
If standardPdfFont is true then, when exporting, non-standard fonts of the report will be replaced by the standard fonts in resulting document.
